system.effect: A powerful slash opens a painful rent in the target's body. He suffers 1 level of Fatigue and must make a Challenging (+0) Toughness test or be Stunned for 1 round.

description.value:
Rending Damage to Body (Severity 2)

A powerful slash opens a painful rent in the target's body. He suffers 1 level of Fatigue and must make a Challenging (+0) Toughness test or be Stunned for 1 round.
